message: Revert null pointer check that was removed in revision 749515 (prior to branching); causes a NullPointerException.
Revert null pointer check that was removed in revision 749515; causes a NullPointerException.

Fix NullPointerException when using Maven 3.0.3:

	at org.apache.myfaces.trinidadbuild.plugin.tagdoc.TagdocReport.executeReport(TagdocReport.java:108)
